meanings.definition: Binturongs: a large, tree-dwelling mammal native to Southeast Asia, also known as a bearcat.
meanings.sent1: The binturongs in the forest move gracefully among the trees.
meanings.sent2: We learned about binturongs in our science class.
meanings.sent3: The binturongs decided to have a tree-climbing race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as dark and silky as a binturong's fur.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the binturongs swinging from branch to branch was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Binturongs: plural form of binturong, referring to more than one of these animals.
meanings.sent1: Look at those binturongs playing together in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The binturongs are known for their distinct scent.
meanings.sent3: The binturongs formed a band and started a musical performance.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the calls of the binturongs.
meanings.sent5: A group of binturongs is called a 'scent' - how interesting!
